segment.source: Common Secondary Tab Features
segment.target: Common Secondary Tab Features

segment.source: Common Secondary Tab Features
segment.target: Common Secondary Tab Features

segment.source: Common Secondary Tab Features
segment.target: Common Secondary Tab Features

segment.source: Each secondary tab has two sections—Group Policy objects and Groups and Users.
segment.target: Each secondary tab has two sections—Group Policy objects and Groups and Users.

segment.source: Group Policy objects section
segment.target: Group Policy objects section

segment.source: The Group Policy objects section displays a filtered list of Group Policy objects (GPOs) and identifies the following characteristics for each GPO:
segment.target: The Group Policy objects section displays a filtered list of Group Policy objects (GPOs) and identifies the following characteristics for each GPO:

segment.source: GPO Characteristic
segment.target: GPO Characteristic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Name of the Group Policy object.
segment.target: Name of the Group Policy object.

segment.source: Computer (Comp.)
segment.target: Computer (Comp.)

segment.source: Automatically generated version of the Computer Configuration portion of the GPO.
segment.target: Automatically generated version of the Computer Configuration portion of the GPO.

segment.source: User
segment.target: User

segment.source: Automatically generated version of the User Configuration portion of the GPO.
segment.target: Automatically generated version of the User Configuration portion of the GPO.

segment.source: State
segment.target: State

segment.source: The state of the selected GPO:
segment.target: The state of the selected GPO:

segment.source: Uncontrolled: Not managed by AGPM.
segment.target: Uncontrolled: Not managed by AGPM.

segment.source: Checked In: Available for authorized Editors to check out for editing or for a Group Policy administrator to deploy.
segment.target: Checked In: Available for authorized Editors to check out for editing or for a Group Policy administrator to deploy.

segment.source: Checked Out: Currently being edited.
segment.target: Checked Out: Currently being edited.

segment.source: Unavailable for other Editors to check out until the Editor who checked it out or an AGPM Administrator checks it in.
segment.target: Unavailable for other Editors to check out until the Editor who checked it out or an AGPM Administrator checks it in.

segment.source: Pending: Awaiting approval from a Group Policy administrator before being created, controlled, deployed, or deleted.
segment.target: Pending: Awaiting approval from a Group Policy administrator before being created, controlled, deployed, or deleted.

segment.source: Deleted: Deleted from the archive, but still able to be restored.
segment.target: Deleted: Deleted from the archive, but still able to be restored.

segment.source: Template: A static version of a GPO for use as a starting point when creating new GPOs.
segment.target: Template: A static version of a GPO for use as a starting point when creating new GPOs.

segment.source: Template (default): By default, this template is the starting point used when creating a new GPO.
segment.target: Template (default): By default, this template is the starting point used when creating a new GPO.

segment.source: GPO Status
segment.target: GPO Status

segment.source: The Computer Configuration and the User Configuration can be managed separately.
segment.target: The Computer Configuration and the User Configuration can be managed separately.

segment.source: The GPO Status indicates which portions of the GPO are enabled.
segment.target: The GPO Status indicates which portions of the GPO are enabled.

segment.source: WMI Filter
segment.target: WMI Filter

segment.source: Display any WMI filters that are applied to this GPO.
segment.target: Display any WMI filters that are applied to this GPO.

segment.source: WMI filters are managed under the WMI Filters node for the domain in the console tree of the GPMC.
segment.target: WMI filters are managed under the WMI Filters node for the domain in the console tree of the GPMC.

segment.source: Modified
segment.target: Modified

segment.source: For a controlled GPO, the most recent date when it was checked in after being modified or checked out to be modified.
segment.target: For a controlled GPO, the most recent date when it was checked in after being modified or checked out to be modified.

segment.source: For an uncontrolled GPO, the date when it was last modified.
segment.target: For an uncontrolled GPO, the date when it was last modified.

segment.source: Owner
segment.target: Owner

segment.source: The Editor who checked in or the Approver who deployed the selected GPO.
segment.target: The Editor who checked in or the Approver who deployed the selected GPO.

segment.source: Groups and Users section
segment.target: Groups and Users section

segment.source: When a GPO is selected, the Groups and Users section displays a list of the groups and users with access to that GPO.
segment.target: When a GPO is selected, the Groups and Users section displays a list of the groups and users with access to that GPO.

segment.source: The allowed permissions and inheritance are displayed for each group or user.
segment.target: The allowed permissions and inheritance are displayed for each group or user.

segment.source: An AGPM Administrator can configure permissions using either standard AGPM roles (Editor, Approver, and Reviewer) or a customized combination of permissions.
segment.target: An AGPM Administrator can configure permissions using either standard AGPM roles (Editor, Approver, and Reviewer) or a customized combination of permissions.

segment.source: Button
segment.target: Button

segment.source: Effect
segment.target: Effect

segment.source: Add
segment.target: Add

segment.source: Add a new entry to the security descriptor.
segment.target: Add a new entry to the security descriptor.

segment.source: Any user or group in Active Directory can be added.
segment.target: Any user or group in Active Directory can be added.

segment.source: Remove
segment.target: Remove

segment.source: Remove the selected entry from the Access Control List.
segment.target: Remove the selected entry from the Access Control List.

segment.source: Properties
segment.target: Properties

segment.source: Display the properties for the selected object.
segment.target: Display the properties for the selected object.

segment.source: The properties page is the same one displayed for an object in Active Directory Users and Computers.
segment.target: The properties page is the same one displayed for an object in Active Directory Users and Computers.

segment.source: Advanced
segment.target: Advanced

segment.source: Open the Access Control List Editor.
segment.target: Open the Access Control List Editor.

segment.source: Additional considerations
segment.target: Additional considerations

segment.source: For information about roles and permissions related to specific tasks, see the tasks under Performing AGPM Administrator Tasks, Performing Editor Tasks, Performing Approver Tasks, and Performing Reviewer Tasks.
segment.target: For information about roles and permissions related to specific tasks, see the tasks under Performing AGPM Administrator Tasks, Performing Editor Tasks, Performing Approver Tasks, and Performing Reviewer Tasks.

segment.source: Additional references
segment.target: Additional references

segment.source: Contents Tab
segment.target: Contents Tab
